div.p: SORBONNE was also used in general for the whole faculty of theology at Paris, as the assemblies of the whole body were held in the house of the Sorbonne, and the bachelors of the other houses of the faculty came hither to hold their sÎ¿rbonnique, or act for being admitted doctor of divinity.
